definition: Canton-Hankou Railway, linking Guangzhou and Wuchang, incorporated since 1957 into the Jing-Guang Railway 京廣鐵路|京广铁路[Jing1 Guang3 Tie3 lu4]

pinyin: Jia1 na2 da4 Tai4 ping2 yang2 Tie3 lu4
Tai4 ping2 Yang2 Lian2 he2 Tie3 lu4

sentences.english: They never allowed the government to develop trains.
sentences.chinese: 它們絕不允許政府開發鐵路。

sentences.english: In this paper, the technical features of the structure of the Bridge are briefly described.
sentences.chinese: 簡要介紹粵海鐵路棧橋的結構技術特點。

sentences.english: The Construction of Chongqing-Huaihua Railway will exert a tremendous influence on the economic development of the area along the railway.
sentences.chinese: 渝懷鐵路修建對沿線地區經濟發展具有重要意義。

sentences.english: The land has appreciated greatly since the new railway was buit.
sentences.chinese: 自從新鐵路築成以後，這塊地的價值大爲增高。

sentences.english: Evena railway map is close to classified information.
sentences.chinese: 即使是一張鐵路圖也近似於機密消息。

sentences.english: Permafrost problems are the core of the three principal technical difficulties in the Qinghai-Tibet railway construction.
sentences.chinese: 青藏鐵路建設三大技術難題的核心是凍土問題。

sentences.english: Some of the farmers had quit farming and were cutting railroad ties so they could feed their families.
sentences.chinese: 有些農民放棄了耕作，靠砍伐鋪鐵路的枕木養家餬口。

sentences.english: Ultra-fast railways will have their day.
sentences.chinese: 極速鐵路總會有迎來成功的一天。

sentences.english: B： By sea， please. Because of the high cost of railway transportation， we prefer sea transportation.
sentences.chinese: 請海運發貨，鐵路運輸費用太高，我們願意走海運。

sentences.english: The most stringent environmental protection measures in China's railway construction history have been introduced.
sentences.chinese: 採取鐵路建設史上最嚴格的環保措施。

sentences.english: Houmpheng says the Chinese-built railway can help the country overcome its isolation.
sentences.chinese: 洪屏說中國建造的鐵路能幫助國家克服封閉。

sentences.english: It is the rail and commercial center for the vast northern section of the country. Population, 385, 603.
sentences.chinese: 是這個國家北部廣大地區鐵路和商業中心。

sentences.english: A cab was provided for driver and fireman, as in normal railway practice .
sentences.chinese: 按通常的鐵路慣例，機車備有司機和司爐室。

sentences.english: If so, the dismissals would not necessarily affect railway development.
sentences.chinese: 如果是這樣，撤職官員就可能不會影響鐵路的發展。

sentences.english: The inter-city rail service is good.
sentences.chinese: 城市間的鐵路服務是好的。

sentences.english: Therefore the Central Committee has decided to reaffirm centralized and unified leadership in accordance with the special characteristics of railway work.
sentences.chinese: 所以中央的決定是根據鐵路的特性，重申集中統一。

definition: to link/to join/to attach/connection/a link (on web page)
to open up (windows for air, ideas for discussion, transportation routes etc)
along the line (e.g. railway)/the region near the line
light rail/transit system (underground, at street level or elevated)/streetcar/metro/abbr. for 輕型軌道交通|轻型轨道交通[qing1 xing2 gui3 dao4 jiao1 tong1]
